txt.en: 'It is time for us to set foot in the open air once more. I do not know about you, but I never thought Khazad-d√ªm would be so deadly.\n\n'I am glad I will have completed my venture across all of it, but gladder still to have made it out alive. Come, [placeholder]! Let us go smell the fresher air.'

'I feel better already! A bit of fresh air does one good, even a dwarf. Now I cannot wait to delve back into the great mine! I have not yet decided where to settle... perhaps the Deep Descent, or the Chamber of the Cross-roads.\n\n'Sunlight is a lovely break from the dark, but I am a dwarf, after all.'
Svanr would like you to accompany him when he leaves the east gate of Moria.
Journey with Svanr to the Dimrill Dale
Svanr is in the First Hall of Moria, in Nud-melek.\n\nYou should speak with Svanr to travel into the Dale.
Svanr is at the First Hall of Moria.\n\nYou should speak with Svanr.
